101.method_signature: method KthElement(arr: array<int>, k: int) returns (result: int)
101.task_description: Write a method in Dafny to find the k-th element in the given array using 1-based indexing.

267.task_description: Write a method in Dafny that takes in an integer n and returns the sum of the squares of the first n odd natural numbers.

431.method_signature: method HasCommonElement(a: array<int>, b: array<int>) returns (result: bool)
431.task_description: Write a method in Dafny that takes two integer arrays and returns true if they have at least one common element.

454.task_description: Write a method in Dafny that matches a word containing 'z'.

474.method_signature: method ReplaceChars(s: string, oldChar: char, newChar: char) returns (v: string)
474.task_description: Write a method in Dafny to replace characters in a string.

58.method_signature: method HasOppositeSign(a: int, b: int) returns (result: bool)
58.task_description: Write a method in Dafny to check whether the given two integers have opposite sign or not.

599.method_signature: method SumAndAverage(n: int) returns (sum: int, average: real)
599.task_description: Write a method in Dafny to find sum and average of first n natural numbers.

600.task_description: Write a method in Dafny to check whether the given number is even or not.

605.task_description: Write a method in Dafny to check if the given integer is a prime number.

627.task_description: Write a method in Dafny to find the smallest missing number from a sorted list of natural numbers.

741.task_description: Write a method in Dafny to check whether all the characters are same or not.

743.method_signature: method RotateRight(l: seq<int>, n: int) returns (r: seq<int>)
743.task_description: Write a method in Dafny to rotate a given list by specified N number of items to the right direction.

77.task_description: Write a method in Dafny to find whether a number is divisible by 11.

770.task_description: Write a method in Dafny to find the sum of fourth power of first n odd natural numbers.
